p: UPLC-HRMS/MS data revealed that the major terpenoid (12) was dehydroursolic acid lactone (3β-hydroxyurs-11-en-13β(28)-olide), which belong to ursane type of pentacyclic triterpenoids and identified earlier in E. viminalis leaves ( Horn and Lamberton, 1964; Savina et al., 1988). Monoisotopic mass 454.3438 Da, formula C30H46O3, the diagnostic ion 437.34 [M-OH+H] + and others MS/MS data supported its identification ( Sidana et al., 2012; Brezáni et al., 2018) ( Table 1, Figure 2).
